Federal.Description: The United States does not have a comprehensive federal data privacy law. Instead, data privacy is regulated through sector-specific laws such as the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) and the Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act (GLBA).

California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA).Description: A state statute intended to enhance privacy rights and consumer protection for residents of California.

Virginia Consumer Data Protection Act (V.Description: A state law that provides Virginia residents with privacy rights and protections concerning their personal data.

Colorado Privacy Act (CPA).Description: A comprehensive data privacy law that grants Colorado residents certain rights over their personal data.

New York SHIELD Act.Description: A state law that enhances the protection of personal data of New York residents, including provisions for data security and breach notification.

Texas Data Privacy and Security Act (TDP.Description: A state law designed to protect the privacy and security of personal data for Texas residents, granting them specific rights over their data and imposing obligations on businesses handling personal information.

Montana Consumer Data Privacy Act (MTCDP.Description: A state law that establishes privacy rights for Montana residents and imposes obligations on businesses that collect and process personal data.

Florida Digital Bill of Rights.Description: A state law that grants Florida residents specific rights over their personal data and imposes obligations on businesses that handle such data, including the right to opt out of data sales.

Hawaii Consumer Privacy Protection Act.Description: A state law designed to provide Hawaii residents with rights over their personal data and to establish responsibilities for businesses in managing and securing this data.

Ohio Personal Privacy Act (OPPA).Description: A state law that provides Ohio residents with rights over their personal data and imposes obligations on businesses to protect and manage that data responsibly.

Massachusetts Data Security Law.Description: A state law that requires entities to safeguard personal information and mandates breach notification to affected residents.

Pennsylvania Breach of Personal Informat.Description: A state law that requires entities to notify individuals of any breach involving their personal data.

New Jersey Identity Theft Prevention Act.Description: A state law that includes provisions for safeguarding personal information, mandates breach notification, and aims to prevent identity theft.

Michigan Identity Theft Protection Act.Description: A state law that requires businesses to protect personal information and notify Michigan residents in the event of a data breach.

North Carolina Identity Theft Protection.Description: A state law that protects residents from identity theft by requiring businesses to safeguard personal information and notify individuals in case of a data breach.

Illinois Biometric Information Privacy A.Description: A state law that regulates the collection, use, and storage of biometric information and provides specific rights to Illinois residents regarding their biometric data.

Maryland Personal Information Protection.Description: A state law that requires businesses to protect personal information and notify Maryland residents in the event of a data breach.

Indiana Data Security Breach Notificatio.Description: A state law that requires entities to notify Indiana residents of any data breach involving their personal information.

Washington Privacy Act (WPA).Description: A comprehensive data privacy law that provides Washington residents with rights over their personal data and imposes obligations on businesses handling such data.

Minnesota Data Practices Act.Description: A state law that governs the collection, storage, use, and dissemination of personal data by public and private entities in Minnesota.

Utah Consumer Privacy Act (UCPA).Description: A state law that provides Utah residents with rights over their personal data, including the right to opt-out of the sale of their data and the right to access, correct, or delete their data.

Alabama Data Breach Notification Act.Description: A state law that requires entities to notify Alabama residents if their personal information is compromised in a data breach.

Oregon Consumer Identity Theft Protectio.Description: A state law that requires businesses to protect personal information and notify Oregon residents in the event of a data breach.

Tennessee Identity Theft Deterrence Act.Description: A state law aimed at preventing identity theft by requiring businesses to safeguard personal information and notify Tennessee residents in case of a data breach.

Missouri Data Breach Notification Law.Description: A state law that requires businesses to notify Missouri residents if their personal information is compromised in a data breach.

Maine Notice of Risk to Personal Data Ac.Description: A state law that requires businesses to notify Maine residents if their personal data is compromised in a data breach.

New Mexico Data Breach Notification Act.Description: A state law that requires businesses to notify New Mexico residents if their personal data is compromised in a data breach.

Connecticut Personal Data Privacy and On.Description: A state law that governs the collection, use, and protection of personal data by businesses and requires breach notifications to Connecticut residents.

Louisiana Database Security Breach Notif.Description: A state law that mandates businesses to notify Louisiana residents in the event of a data breach involving their personal information.

Kentucky Data Breach Notification Law.Description: A state law that requires businesses to notify Kentucky residents if their personal information is compromised in a data breach.

Kansas Consumer Protection Act.Description: A state law that provides protections for Kansas consumers, including requirements for data breach notifications.

Wisconsin Data Breach Notification Law.Description: A state law that mandates businesses to notify Wisconsin residents if their personal information is compromised in a data breach.

New Hampshire Consumer Protection Act.Description: A state law that provides consumer protections, including data breach notification requirements for businesses that handle personal information.

Nevada Privacy of Information Collected.Description: A state law that grants Nevada residents the right to opt-out of the sale of their personal information collected online and imposes data protection requirements on businesses.

Oklahoma Consumer Protection Act.Description: A state law that provides consumer protections, including requirements for data breach notifications to Oklahoma residents.

Iowa Personal Information Security Breac.Description: A state law that mandates businesses to notify Iowa residents if their personal data is compromised in a security breach.

Wyoming Data Security Breach Notificatio.Description: A state law that requires businesses to notify Wyoming residents if their personal information is compromised in a data breach.

South Carolina Financial Identity Fraud.Description: A state law aimed at preventing identity theft and financial fraud by requiring businesses to protect personal information and notify South Carolina residents in the event of a data breach.

Arkansas Personal Information Protection.Description: A state law that requires businesses to notify Arkansas residents if their personal information is compromised in a data breach.

Mississippi Data Breach Notification Law.Description: A state law that mandates businesses to notify Mississippi residents if their personal information is compromised in a data breach.

North Dakota Data Breach Notification La.Description: A state law that requires businesses to notify North Dakota residents if their personal information is compromised in a data breach.

Nebraska Financial Data Protection and C.Description: A state law that mandates businesses to protect personal financial data and notify Nebraska residents in the event of a data breach.

West Virginia Consumer Credit and Protec.Description: A state law that includes provisions for consumer protection, including requirements for data breach notifications to West Virginia residents.

Delaware Online Privacy and Protection A.Description: A state law that requires businesses to protect the personal information of Delaware residents and mandates breach notification.

Vermont Data Broker Regulation.Description: A state law that regulates data brokers, requiring them to protect the personal information they collect and to notify Vermont residents in the event of a data breach.

Rhode Island Identity Theft Protection A.Description: A state law that mandates businesses to notify Rhode Island residents if their personal information is compromised in a data breach.

South Dakota Data Breach Notification La.Description: A state law that requires businesses to notify South Dakota residents if their personal information is compromised in a data breach.

Federal Trade Commission (FTC).Description: The primary federal agency responsible for enforcing privacy-related laws and protecting consumers.

State Attorneys General.Description: State-level authorities responsible for enforcing state-specific privacy laws.
